name: RolandSkySupport
_source: speak;Sky;Oh, hello, Roland. Are you holding up well?
speak;Roland;Yeah, I'm doing great! I just wanted to see you cast some spells.
speak;Roland;eah! I've never known a damn thing about magic, so I thought I could learn a thing or two.
speak;Sky;I'm afraid magic isn't something you can quite learn from watching. You need to spend months practicing, and that's if you have a natural talent.
speak;Roland;Yeah, I figured as much. A friend back home used to tell me the same thing.
speak;Sky;A friend? I take it they were a mage, too?
speak;Roland;Yup. Strongest mage I've ever known. I could never even land a single blow on her before she froze me!
speak;Sky;She specialized in ice magic? Must have been quite powerful indeed.
speak;Roland;Yeah{tgm}...{tgm} if we ever get the chance, I'll introduce you to her, yeah?
